mn44:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn44:1.3: Atha kho visakho upasako yena dhammadinna bhikkhuni tenupasankami; upasankamitva dhammadinnam bhikkhunim abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho visakho upasako dhammadinnam bhikkhunim etadavoca:
mn44:2.2: Katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkayo vutto bhagavata”ti?
mn44:2.3: “Panca kho ime, avuso visakha, upadanakkhandha sakkayo vutto bhagavata,
mn44:2.5: Ime kho, avuso visakha, pancupadanakkhandha sakkayo vutto bhagavata”ti.
mn44:2.6: “Sadhayye”ti kho visakho upasako dhammadinnaya bhikkhuniya bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva dhammadinnam bhikkhunim uttarim panham apucchi:
mn44:3.2: Katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkayasamudayo vutto bhagavata”ti?
mn44:3.3: “Yayam, avuso visakha, tanha ponobbhavika nandiragasahagata tatratatrabhinandini, seyyathidam—
mn44:3.5: ayam kho, avuso visakha, sakkayasamudayo vutto bhagavata”ti.
mn44:4.2: Katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkayanirodho vutto bhagavata”ti?
mn44:4.3: “Yo kho, avuso visakha, tassayeva tanhaya asesaviraganirodho cago patinissaggo mutti analayo;
mn44:4.4: ayam kho, avuso visakha, sakkayanirodho vutto bhagavata”ti.
mn44:5.2: Katama nu kho, ayye, sakkayanirodhagamini patipada vutta bhagavata”ti?
mn44:5.3: “Ayameva kho, avuso visakha, ariyo atthangiko maggo sakkayanirodhagamini patipada vutta bhagavata, seyyathidam—
mn44:5.4: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi”ti.
mn44:6.1: “Tanneva nu kho, ayye, upadanam te pancupadanakkhandha udahu annatra pancahupadanakkhandhehi upadanan”ti?
mn44:6.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, tanneva upadanam te pancupadanakkhandha, napi annatra pancahupadanakkhandhehi upadanam.
mn44:6.3: Yo kho, avuso visakha, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu chandarago tam tattha upadanan”ti.
mn44:7.2: “Idhavuso visakha, assutava puthujjano, ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito,
mn44:7.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
mn44:7.7: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
mn44:7.8: Evam kho, avuso visakha, sakkayaditthi hoti”ti.
mn44:8.2: “Idhavuso visakha, sutava ariyasavako, ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito, sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito,
mn44:8.3: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam.
mn44:8.7: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam.
mn44:8.8: Evam kho, avuso visakha, sakkayaditthi na hoti”ti.
mn44:9.2: “Ayameva kho, avuso visakha, ariyo atthangiko maggo, seyyathidam—
mn44:9.3: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi”ti.
mn44:10.1: “Ariyo panayye, atthangiko maggo sankhato udahu asankhato”ti?
mn44:10.2: “Ariyo kho, avuso visakha, atthangiko maggo sankhato”ti.
mn44:11.1: “Ariyena nu kho, ayye, atthangikena maggena tayo khandha sangahita udahu tihi khandhehi ariyo atthangiko maggo sangahito”ti?
mn44:11.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, ariyena atthangikena maggena tayo khandha sangahita; tihi ca kho, avuso visakha, khandhehi ariyo atthangiko maggo sangahito.
mn44:11.3: Ya cavuso visakha, sammavaca yo ca sammakammanto yo ca sammaajivo ime dhamma silakkhandhe sangahita.
mn44:11.4: Yo ca sammavayamo ya ca sammasati yo ca sammasamadhi ime dhamma samadhikkhandhe sangahita.
mn44:11.5: Ya ca sammaditthi yo ca sammasankappo, ime dhamma pannakkhandhe sangahita”ti.
mn44:12.1: “Katamo panayye, samadhi, katame dhamma samadhinimitta, katame dhamma samadhiparikkhara, katama samadhibhavana”ti?
mn44:12.2: “Ya kho, avuso visakha, cittassa ekaggata ayam samadhi;
mn44:12.5: Ya tesamyeva dhammanam asevana bhavana bahulikammam, ayam ettha samadhibhavana”ti.
mn44:14.1: “Katamo panayye, kayasankharo, katamo vacisankharo, katamo cittasankharo”ti?
mn44:14.2: “Assasapassasa kho, avuso visakha, kayasankharo, vitakkavicara vacisankharo, sanna ca vedana ca cittasankharo”ti.
mn44:15.1: “Kasma panayye, assasapassasa kayasankharo, kasma vitakkavicara vacisankharo, kasma sanna ca vedana ca cittasankharo”ti?
mn44:15.2: “Assasapassasa kho, avuso visakha, kayika ete dhamma kayappatibaddha, tasma assasapassasa kayasankharo.
mn44:15.3: Pubbe kho, avuso visakha, vitakketva vicaretva paccha vacam bhindati, tasma vitakkavicara vacisankharo.
mn44:15.4: Sanna ca vedana ca cetasika ete dhamma cittappatibaddha, tasma sanna ca vedana ca cittasankharo”ti.
mn44:16.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, sannavedayitanirodham samapajjantassa bhikkhuno evam hoti:
mn44:16.3: ‘aham sannavedayitanirodham samapajjissan’ti va, ‘aham sannavedayitanirodham samapajjami’ti va, ‘aham sannavedayitanirodham samapanno’ti va.
mn44:16.4: Atha khvassa pubbeva tatha cittam bhavitam hoti yam tam tathattaya upaneti”ti.
mn44:17.1: “Sannavedayitanirodham samapajjantassa panayye, bhikkhuno katame dhamma pathamam nirujjhanti—yadi va kayasankharo, yadi va vacisankharo, yadi va cittasankharo”ti?
mn44:17.2: “Sannavedayitanirodham samapajjantassa kho, avuso visakha, bhikkhuno pathamam nirujjhati vacisankharo, tato kayasankharo, tato cittasankharo”ti.
mn44:18.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahantassa bhikkhuno evam hoti:
mn44:18.3: ‘aham sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahissan’ti va, ‘aham sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahami’ti va, ‘aham sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthito’ti va.
mn44:18.4: Atha khvassa pubbeva tatha cittam bhavitam hoti yam tam tathattaya upaneti”ti.
mn44:19.1: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahantassa panayye, bhikkhuno katame dhamma pathamam uppajjanti—yadi va kayasankharo, yadi va vacisankharo, yadi va cittasankharo”ti?
mn44:19.2: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthahantassa kho, avuso visakha, bhikkhuno pathamam uppajjati cittasankharo, tato kayasankharo, tato vacisankharo”ti.
mn44:20.1: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthitam panayye, bhikkhum kati phassa phusanti”ti?
mn44:20.2: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthitam kho, avuso visakha, bhikkhum tayo phassa phusanti—sunnato phasso, animitto phasso, appanihito phasso”ti.
mn44:21.1: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthitassa panayye, bhikkhuno kimninnam cittam hoti kimponam kimpabbharan”ti?
mn44:21.2: “Sannavedayitanirodhasamapattiya vutthitassa kho, avuso visakha, bhikkhuno vivekaninnam cittam hoti, vivekaponam vivekapabbharan”ti.
mn44:22.3: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana”ti.
mn44:23.1: “Katama panayye, sukha vedana, katama dukkha vedana, katama adukkhamasukha vedana”ti?
mn44:23.2: “Yam kho, avuso visakha, kayikam va cetasikam va sukham satam vedayitam—
mn44:23.4: Yam kho, avuso visakha, kayikam va cetasikam va dukkham asatam vedayitam—
mn44:23.6: Yam kho, avuso visakha, kayikam va cetasikam va neva satam nasatam vedayitam—
mn44:24.1: “Sukha panayye, vedana kimsukha kimdukkha, dukkha vedana kimsukha kimdukkha, adukkhamasukha vedana kimsukha kimdukkha”ti?
mn44:24.2: “Sukha kho, avuso visakha, vedana thitisukha viparinamadukkha;
mn44:25.1: “Sukhaya panayye, vedanaya kim anusayo anuseti, dukkhaya vedanaya kim anusayo anuseti, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya kim anusayo anuseti”ti?
mn44:25.2: “Sukhaya kho, avuso visakha, vedanaya raganusayo anuseti, dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo anuseti, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo anuseti”ti.
mn44:26.1: “Sabbaya nu kho, ayye, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo anuseti, sabbaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo anuseti, sabbaya adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo anuseti”ti?
mn44:26.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, sabbaya sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo anuseti, na sabbaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo anuseti, na sabbaya adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo anuseti”ti.
mn44:27.1: “Sukhaya panayye, vedanaya kim pahatabbam, dukkhaya vedanaya kim pahatabbam, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya kim pahatabban”ti?
mn44:27.2: “Sukhaya kho, avuso visakha, vedanaya raganusayo pahatabbo, dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo pahatabbo, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo pahatabbo”ti.
mn44:28.1: “Sabbaya nu kho, ayye, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo pahatabbo, sabbaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo pahatabbo, sabbaya adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo pahatabbo”ti?
mn44:28.2: “Na kho, avuso visakha, sabbaya sukhaya vedanaya raganusayo pahatabbo, na sabbaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayo pahatabbo, na sabbaya adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayo pahatabbo.
mn44:28.3: Idhavuso visakha, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn44:28.4: Ragam tena pajahati, na tattha raganusayo anuseti.
mn44:28.6: ‘kudassu namaham tadayatanam upasampajja viharissami yadariya etarahi ayatanam upasampajja viharanti’ti?
mn44:28.7: Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piham upatthapayato uppajjati pihappaccaya domanassam.
mn44:28.8: Patigham tena pajahati, na tattha patighanusayo anuseti.
mn44:28.9: Idhavuso visakha, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana, dukkhassa ca pahana, pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama, adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn44:28.10: Avijjam tena pajahati, na tattha avijjanusayo anuseti”ti.
mn44:29.2: “Sukhaya kho, avuso visakha, vedanaya dukkha vedana patibhago”ti.
mn44:29.4: “Dukkhaya kho, avuso visakha, vedanaya sukha vedana patibhago”ti.
mn44:29.6: “Adukkhamasukhaya kho, avuso visakha, vedanaya avijja patibhago”ti.
mn44:29.14: “Accayasi, avuso visakha, panham, nasakkhi panhanam pariyantam gahetum.
mn44:29.15: Nibbanogadhanhi, avuso visakha, brahmacariyam, nibbanaparayanam nibbanapariyosanam.
mn44:29.16: Akankhamano ca tvam, avuso visakha, bhagavantam upasankamitva etamattham puccheyyasi, yatha ca te bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyasi”ti.
mn44:30.1: Atha kho visakho upasako dhammadinnaya bhikkhuniya bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana dhammadinnam bhikkhunim abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn44:30.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho visakho upasako yavatako ahosi dhammadinnaya bhikkhuniya saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
mn44:30.3: Evam vutte, bhagava visakham upasakam etadavoca:
mn44:30.4: “pandita, visakha, dhammadinna bhikkhuni, mahapanna, visakha, dhammadinna bhikkhuni.
mn44:30.5: Mancepi tvam, visakha, etamattham puccheyyasi, ahampi tam evamevam byakareyyam, yatha tam dhammadinnaya bhikkhuniya byakatam.
mn44:30.6: Eso cevetassa attho. Evanca nam dharehi”ti.
mn44:30.8: Attamano visakho upasako bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
